alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 3:13PM HST until March 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH TONIGHT... .Strong westerly winds will continue tonight, with a slow downtrend expected. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 55 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
